text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi 1) instead tell ur friend not to bring people from abroad to India .
2) don't be hurry to lift lockdown in ur country else we need to send it to u.
3) love India n not any individual.
4) plan to punish #china n #tedros after getting out of #covid19 
5) Be serious n not careless.
